name: RPS for messenger
description:
Play interactive games with your friends on Facebook Messenger!
Make chats and gatherings more fascinating!
The very chat tool you need on Facebook Messenger!

- Rock-Paper-Scissors and Dice: Duke it out with your friends;
- Left or Right? Exercising or Shopping？Flip a coin to decide;
- Truth or Dare, random tasks all in one;
- Thai, Chinese, Indian or Japanese cuisine? Let Slot Machine make the choice;
- More interactive games to be developed for your nonstop entertainment!

Simple and entertaining: easy operations，no need of registration, interacting with your friends with one single button;
High speed and efficiency: Once the app is quit, it will not occupy any background resource or memory and no more cell phone traffic will be consumed.

Should there be any questions or suggestions, please send an email to rpschats@gmail.com
